translations.fileUploader.select: Selecciona un archivo o arrástralo aquí
translations.footer.msg: © Little Terrarium 2022 - Código fuente disponible en {$github.link}
translations.general.irreversible: Está acción no se puede deshacer.
translations.general.name: Nombre
translations.interfaces.light.fullsunVerbose: La luz brilla todo el día
translations.interfaces.light.partialsunVerbose: La luz está aquí durante parte del día
translations.interfaces.light.shadeVerbose: El sol no puede pasar aquí
translations.location-add-edit.choose: ¡Elige una foto bonita para mostrar tu bonita ventana/balcón/cocina/lo que sea!
translations.location-add-edit.lightInfo: Probablemente no haya nada tan importanto para una planta como la luz (o la falta de ésta).
translations.location-add-edit.name: El nombre del nuevo lugar donde tus plantas van a vivir. Elige un {$START_BOLD_TEXT}nombre identificativo{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}: {$START_ITALIC_TEXT}ventana, balcón, mesilla{$CLOSE_ITALIC_TEXT}...
translations.location-add-edit.nameTip: {$START_BOLD_TEXT}Piensa{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}: cuando hablas con tus amigos de dónde tienes las plantas, ¿cómo lo llamas?
translations.location-add-edit.ornot: O bueno, no lo hagas. Como tú veas.
translations.location-add-edit.visibility: Cuando el lugar es {$START_BOLD_TEXT}públicamente visible{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, otros usuarios podrán verlo cuando lo visiten desde tu perfil (si también es {$START_BOLD_TEXT}público{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, claro).
translations.location-add-edit.visibilityNote: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Observa{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} que tus plantas y fotos tienen su propia opción de privacidad, por lo que si no quieres que alguien vea alguna de tus plantas moribundas o tus fotos borrosas las puedes ocultar de forma individual aunque tu lugar sea público.
translations.location.remove: Se eliminará este lugar junto con sus plantas y fotos. ¿Estás seguro?
translations.photo-add.addMsg: Hora de presumir de tu jungla personal.
translations.photo-add.addMsgLimit: Hasta {$START_BOLD_TEXT}10 fotos{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} de una vez. Una vez que las subas, podrás editar su descripción y cambiar el orden de muestra con la fecha en la que fueron tomadas.
translations.photo-add.visibility: Cuando tu foto es {$START_BOLD_TEXT}públicamente visible{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, otros usuarios podrán verla cuando visiten tu perfil (siempre y cuando éste sea {$START_BOLD_TEXT}público{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}).
translations.photo-add.visibilityNote: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Observa{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} que tus lugares y plantas tienen su propia opción de privacidad, y que tiene mayor prioridad que la privacidad de la foto (no pueden ver la foto si la planta es privada).
translations.photo-edit.photoInfo: Cuéntanos un poco sobre esta foto. ¿Representa un momento especial del crecimiento de la planta?
translations.photo-edit.takenAt: ¿Cuándo se tomó la foto? La galería se mostrará en orden cronológico.
translations.plant-add.nameDesc: Este es el momento feliz en el que añadimos nuestras queridas plantas. Lo primero es lo primero: ¡identifícala! ¿Quieres darle un {$START_BOLD_TEXT}nombre{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}?
translations.plant-add.privacy: Cuando tu planta es {$START_BOLD_TEXT}públicamente visible{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, otros usuarios pueden verla cuando visiten tu perfil (siempre y cuando éste sea {$START_BOLD_TEXT}público{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}).
translations.plant-add.privacyTip: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Note{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} that your locations has its own privacy settings, and it supersedes the picture's privacy setting, so users can't see the location plant list, but you can share a direct link to this plant.
translations.plant-add.specieDesc: Have you identified its specie? Search and select it from the list. You can use {$START_LINK}Pl@ntNet{$CLOSE_LINK} to identify it.
translations.plant-edit-fertilizer.header: You need to eat and drink, and so do your plants! Again, {$START_BOLD_TEXT}know{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} your plants, and give them the proper fertiliser they require.
translations.plant-edit-fertilizer.lastTime: Do you remember {$START_BOLD_TEXT}when was the last time{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} you fertilised it?
translations.plant-edit-fertilizer.nextTime: {$START_BOLD_TEXT}How many days{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} should you wait to feed your plant again?
translations.plant-edit-fertilizer.type: What kind of fertiliser are you using? Give it a name (i.e. {$START_ITALIC_TEXT}succulent fertiliser{$CLOSE_ITALIC_TEXT}) or a NPK number.
translations.plant-edit-soil.composition: Let's be a completionist and describe a bit what's your soil {$START_BOLD_TEXT}composition{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}
translations.plant-edit-soil.header: Editing soil and pot options for {$START_BOLD_TEXT}{$INTERPOLATION}{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}
translations.plant-edit-soil.material: What kind of {$START_BOLD_TEXT}material{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} is your plant sitting on?
translations.plant-edit-soil.potDesc: Nothing like finding a proper home to your plants, with a comfy floor!
translations.plant-edit-soil.size: Do you know the {$START_BOLD_TEXT}diameter of your plant{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}?
translations.plant-edit-watering.lastTime: Do you remember {$START_BOLD_TEXT}when was the last time{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} you watered it?
translations.plant-edit-watering.nextTime: {$START_BOLD_TEXT}How many days{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} should you wait to check your plant again?
translations.plant-edit-watering.reminder: The watering frequency reminder should be used to remind yourself that your plant exists, and to check whether it requires your attention or not.
translations.plant-edit-watering.sensitive: Many plants are extremely sensitive to overwatering, and many to drought.
translations.plant-edit-watering.warning: So, first thing first: {$START_TAG_STRONG}NEVER{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} water your plants on a schedule! {$START_BOLD_TEXT}Know your plants{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, check the soil, learn about their necessities, and {$START_BOLD_TEXT}act accordingly{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}.
translations.plant-edit.description: Tell us something about your green friend: Where did you get it? When? How? Is it a variation of the common species? Is there an interesting story behind it?
translations.plant-edit.health: Let's keep track of its health, would you?
translations.plant-widget-fertilizer.confirm: This will update your {$START_BOLD_TEXT}last time fertilized{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} to today.
translations.plant-widget-fertilizer.title: Fertilizante
translations.plant-widget-soil.composition: Your plant has a nice soil made up of {$START_BOLD_TEXT}{$INTERPOLATION}{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}.
translations.plant-widget-soil.title: Maceta y sustrato
translations.plant-widget-water.confirm: This will update your {$START_BOLD_TEXT}last time watered{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} to today.
translations.plant-widget-water.title: Agua
translations.plant-widget-water.warning: If you haven't watered it yet, please check your soil. Never water your plants on a schedule!
translations.plant.remove: This will remove this plant and all of its photos. Are you sure?
translations.user-edit.avatarDesc: Also known as profile picture. Just an image to present yourself.
translations.user-edit.bioDesc: Tell us something about yourself! How did you get in the green world, what kind of plants do you like, where are you based, etc.
translations.user-edit.emailDesc: This is {$START_TAG_STRONG}important{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG}! This is how you can recover your account in case you forget your password.
translations.user-edit.fullnameDesc: In case you want to present yourself more professionally.
translations.user-edit.privateProfile: If your profile is private, you won't be able to share it, but you'll still enjoy of all of the features of Little Terrarium.
translations.user-edit.publicProfile: If your profile is public, you will be able to share it to whomever you want to, and brag about your plants.
translations.user-edit.usernameDesc: This is how you'll be known around here, and how your profile will be accesed. Short, no spaces, no weird things.
translations.user-register.emailDesc: This is how we identify you uniquely, and it's needed to receive notifications and to reset your password in case you forget it.
translations.user-register.emailTaken: Sorry, your e-mail already exists in our system. Are you sure you don't have an account already?
translations.user-register.lookingForward: We are looking forward to welcoming you to our family!
translations.user-register.passwordDesc: {$START_BOLD_TEXT}We're almost there{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}. Last but not least, a {$START_BOLD_TEXT}password{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} to protect your access
translations.user-register.passwordLength: Password must be at least {$START_BOLD_TEXT}{$INTERPOLATION} characters{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} long
translations.user-register.usernameDesc: First of all, let's decide on your {$START_BOLD_TEXT}username{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}. It may be the moniker you've been using for the last 20 years or something like your Instagram username
translations.user-register.usernameTaken: Sorry, your username already exists. Please choose another.
translations.user-signin.invalidCredentials: Lo sentimos, tus datos no son válidos.
